import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faCartShopping, faUser } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { useAuth } from "../../context/auth"; import toast from "react-hot-toast"; import { Dropdown } from "flowbite-react"; const Header = ({ id }) => { const [auth, setAuth] = useAuth(); const handleLogout = () => { setAuth({ ...auth, user: null, token: "", }); localStorage.removeItem("auth"); toast.success("Logout Successfully"); }; return ( <>
